Title: Designates lay individuals as one-day marriage officiants in order to solemnize marriages
Summary: Designates lay individuals as one-day marriage officiants in order to solemnize marriages.
LawCode: Amd §§11, 12, 13 & 13-b, Dom Rel L; add §110, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law and the executive law, in relation to designating lay individuals to solemnize marriages
